topics.body:
Let's have sex with a cat?" asked the zoophiliac.
"Let's have sex with the cat and then torture it?" says the sadist.
"Let's have sex with the cat, torture it and then kill it?" shouted the murderer.
"Let's have sex with the cat, torture it, kill it and then have sex with it again?" said the necrophiliac.
"Let's have sex with the cat, torture it, kill it, have sex with it again and then burn it?" said the pyromaniac.
[spoiler]There was silence, and then the masochist said: "Meow."[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
A crocodile walks into a bar and immediately attacks and devours this old, biker lady smoking a cigarette while carving her initials into her table.

The crocodile gulps her down, then asks the bartender for a beer.

The bartender says "We don't serve drug users here."

The crocodile is offended. "I'm not a drug user!" he shouts.

The bartender replies, [spoiler]"Oh yeah? What about that bar bitch you ate?"[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:

The operator says: "Calm down, first, you have to make sure he is dead"

[spoiler]The guys says ok and shoots his friend[/spoiler] "Now what?"

topics.body:
You know what's REALLY interesting. When Bayonetta first came out, a lot of people criticized her design as being "overly sexual." First of  all that's kind of the point. But what boggles me is that some people automatically assumed it was a MAN who designed Bayonetta and Jeanne. And yes, Hideki Kamiya did CREATE Bayo he did not design her.
!http://www.nautiljon.com/images/people/00/67/shimazaki_mari_28876.jpg?0!
This lady did! Shimazaki Mari.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d41dbd6368720c0e2f0000#post_53d41dbd6368720c0e2f0000
Well after they whole debacle of "OMG it's objectifying women" died down, a lot of people took a step back and actually LOOKED at Bayo. And I'll say it right now, sexualization does not automatically mean objectification. Hell I feel confident in saying that Bayonetta is the best written female character of the entire last Generation. More than Elly, Elizabeth or Clementine.
